full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LCAM SRING DGUN GYIS AA DE RGYAL MO'I SGO NAS RNGA MONG THAN BZLOG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (DE NAS LO RGYUS DANG PHAN YON NI, SNGON GYIS RGYA GAR BOD PA ZA HOR RGYAL PO ZHES BYA BA ZHIG YOD, ,RGYAL PO BLON PA SOGS KYIS GSER RDZAS DANG NOR DANG 'BRU DANG SOGS LONGS SPYOD RAB TU RGYAS PA GLANG PO CHE DANG, ,RNGA MONG RKANG PHYUGS GRANGS MED MANG ZHING MNGA' THANG LHAG CHEN RGYAL PO SOGS TE LA BU MED PA'I PHYIR BSAM GYIS MI KHYAB PA SDUG CING, ,GSUM LO BA RGUD PA CHE BAR 'BYUNG STE NOR PHYUGS ZAD PAR BU TSA PHONGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MI LAN TSA DANG SHI TSA NAD RIMS MANG DANG PHYUGS LA GOD KHA RGYUN MI CHAD PAR LAS GROL BA'I MAN NGAG BSKUL NGOR, SHUDDHA PRADZNY'A BRIS SO, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
